titles: Gregory, Father-Greybeard, with his vizard off, or, News from the Cabal in some reflexions upon a late pamphlet entituled, The rehearsal transpros'd (after the fashion that now obtains) in a letter to our old friend, R.L. from E.H.
author: Hickeringill, Edmund, 1631-1708.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church and state --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
